CustomField.description: This is used for Contract PDF component conditional visibility
CustomField.formula: NOT ( ISBLANK(TEXT(Payment_Plan__c ))) && NOT (ISBLANK(TEXT( Invoice_type__c ))) && NOT (ISBLANK( Delivery_Location__c )) && NOT (ISBLANK( Delivery_Date__c )) && NOT (ISBLANK ( Count_Opportunity_Products__c )) && IF ( ((Installation_Time__c >0 && NOT(ISBLANK( Preliminary_installation_time__c )) ) || ISBLANK(Installation_Time__c)), true, false )
CustomField.label: Contract base data filled DEL
